item.title: Stef Veldhuis
item.description:
I assisted Stef Veldhuis on technological components and realization of his artworks.

Microcodex

Possibly the first artwork in The Netherlands with a GMO (Genetically Modified Organism). An e-coli bacteria carrying a verse in it’s DNA is carefully kept within the artwork itself. I was responsible for the technology keeping the environment within the bioreactor optimal for the organism to grow. A Raspberry Pi Pico is used as a microcontroller that reads sensor input and drives output.
